entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023
